tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's crucial to have the right doctor by your side during the journey of pregnancy. I am incredibly grateful for my experience with Dr. Daksha. Throughout my pregnancy, she has shown unwavering kindness and professionalism, guiding me with the utmost care every step of the way.

Dr. Daksha's emphasis on natural delivery and her tailored approach to diet and exercise were particularly impressive. She addressed each issue methodically, always prioritizing the safety of both mother and baby. During labor, her constant support and encouragement for a natural delivery were invaluable.

Her friendly demeanor, exceptional patience, and genuine care made her a pillar of strength during my pregnancy. From critical concerns to seemingly trivial questions, she addressed everything with remarkable calmness. Dr. Daksha was my trusted companion from conception to delivery, providing the best possible treatment and support.

I feel truly blessed to have had Dr. Daksha as my doctor throughout this journey. Thankful for her unwavering care and expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Thyroid,
review:
My wonderful journey with Daksha ma'm started in 2020 December when me and my husband thought of having a baby.. 
First I met Daksha ma'm for my irregular periods, then she diagnosed me with PCOS and thyroid issues but she did not jump into any medications straight away instead she explained all the science behind irregular periods and it's association with PCOS and thyroid. Then she suggested only life style changes like exercise and diet control.
After few months my periods became regular and thyroid was under control, then I conceived naturally twice but miscarriage happened both the times. 
Then my real struggle started with healthy conception and in this phase Daksha ma'm really helped me a lot to overcome all the emotional stress and she helped me to understand the reasons for miscarriage and then she started with very basic fertility treatments like ovulation induction, IUI, follicular growth study. After 4 months of basic fertility treatment I was able to conceive naturally and was able to deliver a healthy baby via natural vaginal delivery.. :)
I wrote this much lengthy review just to make anyone understand why they should consult and trust Daksha ma'm. My 3 years journey with Daksha ma'm was really amazing and I thank her for everything. Today I am holding my angel in my arms means, it's all because of Daksha ma'm help and effort.
I recommend anyone who is trying to find trustworthy gynecologist can reach out to Daksha ma'm without any doubts..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Words won't suffice to say how much Dr.Daksha(@C9) has been supportive throughout my pregnancy journey.  But for her, I'm sure I won't have enjoyed my pregnancy as much as I did. She's very patient and extremely positive. Someone who always radiated positivity. She was  extremely keen to have my baby delivered vaginally and kept reassuring me during my visits about  it. I would recommend her for any of the gynaecology related issues. Doctors are God sent they say, she is indeed one !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had a good experience with Dr Daksha. We consulted her during pregnancy and we are very satisfied with the treatment she provided.  She always gave enough information about the symptoms and the treatment which she provided for the same. She is very caring , makes you feel comfortable and is much concerned about her patients, she always replies to any of your worries anytime you call or message her. A very positive person, made us feel a lot better when we had complications.¬† Will surely recommend her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It‚Äôs been a little late for the review and ratings but I'd like to take a moment to share our experience with Daksha Ma‚Äôam 

Recently blessed with Baby Boy
I sincerely appreciate your help and concern even after delivery.
Dr.Daksha has always been really nice, humble, polite, and kind, and we have been consulting with her since day one. Every time we need it,l the doctor responds to our questions and concerns. We adhered to the doctor's recommendations, and everything went off without a hitch. üôèüôèüôè.
Even for delivery with Ma‚Äôam we are quite fortunate.

I highly recommend Daksha ma‚Äôam 

Regards, Madhusmita & Mithun

We had an unfortunate experience with doctor Daksha. ***** ******** *** *** * ***** *** ******** *** ** ****** ************* ** ********* *** ***** ****** ** *** ** *** the scan report by cloudnine hospital was incorrect despite calling them multiple times to correct it. Instead of taking responsibility for it and proceeding with the treatment, the doctor started yelling at us for not coming earlier. We were being courteous *** *** ****** **** ** ** ****** **** ************* and eventually we decided to leave mid consultation.

Doctor is good  ,patient in listening.doesnt give unnecessary medicines. But her clinic is very badly managed by an extremely rude and bad attitude lady . No use of appointments. Long waiting time minimum 1-2 hrs even with appointment.chances are walk in given preference.Very unprofessional,doctor sees you half way and then she starts attending another patient out of order and you are thrown out of consultation room and made to wait for hours to just get a prescription. I was made to pay fees where as I didnot receive any prescription. I am not going ever again for consultation. Dissatisfied and disappointed.

*** ** *** **** ******** ****** * **** **** ******** I was diagnosed with ovarian cyst in my left ovary, initially she explained the different types of cysts and the cons related to it. *** *** *********** *** *** ***** She focused only on the negative points but not on the positive plausible solutions. ******* **** ********** ********* ********** she directly suggested a laparoscopic surgery without even seeing the CA125 reports and torsions values. She wrote innumerable tests **** ** **** ***** **** * ******* ********

Didn‚Äôt even see the doctor, bad experience at the counter they wanted me to again download their own app and register as their member on the app and only then they would have confirmed my appointment let me meet the doctor, their help desk is worse than than a mall billing counter where you don‚Äôt even have a choice whether you want to download a app or not, they are least bothered that you might have taken few hours off from office for this appointment, your time has least amount of value for these people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The friendliness of the doctor was good. She listened to the problems and explained everything which was good. For her  unavailability in the next week she asked to meet some other doctor on her behalf . While any consultation within a week  was free . Still carefit was charging 500 for the Doctor I was going to meet on her behalf just to understand my reports. I chose not to go with carefit as first of all I was meeting a physician instead of gynae also they were charging wrong and I had a gynae issue which was explained by the other doctor I met the next day in some other clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The friendliness of the doctor was good. She listened to the problems and explained everything which was good. I chose not to go with carefit as first of all I was meeting a physician instead of gynae also they were charging wrong and I had a gynae issue which was explained by the other doctor I met the next day in some other clinic.

I had a appointment for 6.30. I arrived 10mins early to complete any formalities since I was visiting for the first time.  Firstly I was made to sign a consent form which said I will  not hold the doctor responsible for any mistake. then I was made to wait  more than a hour and patients who had appointment after me were sent for consultation and I made to wait. When I spoke to the receptionist she said it's because she is a regular patient and lied that she had a earlier appointment. I finally left the clinic without visiting the doctor. not sure if this was because I booked through practo. would have appreciated if they had the courtesy to respect patients time and inform in advance about the delay

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After the consultation, I did not feel confident on evaluation and advise on the diagnosis.Later I shared the test reports to her on WhatsApp(which she herself had asked  me to), it almost took two weeks with multiple follow ups to get  response from her which seemed like she just closed with very little response even I could see some of parameters were off from normal.Also, Staff has shared her personal number to us and doctor was questioning on the same that where did you get this. it seems to me that all of them are not on thr same page which led to overall bad experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Daksha is the most wonderful doctor I have come across. I visited her for vaginismus treatment. I was suffering from it for last 4 years and it affected my mental health and my relationship drastically, to the point of no return. I visited multiple doctors and searched so much about the issue, there is not much awareness about this. I went through complete mental ordeal, lot of gynacs suggested that I need to consult therapist , sexologist etc, i tried doing everything but with no success. Then I came across Dr Daksha post reading reviews on Practo, calling her an angel is like an understatement. What she did was nothing less than a miracle. She gave me complete time and focus and taught me how to do dilator training, she helped me with the whole insertion process. I was in her clinic for about an hour, she patiently taught me and made me practice there itself. Within a week, I was able to insert the largest dilator. I just can't thank her enough for saving me. Dr Daksha please let me know if I can be of any help to you, would be willing to do whatever I can. I don't think I can express the impact of what you did, thank you so much for helping me!!

I visited doctor based on practo reviews for my irregular periods. *** *** **** ************* *** helped my understand my problem.  She gave me medicines but asked me not rely on them completely.  I work in rotational shifts which are avoidable so she gave me few tips on how to maintain a healthy lifestyle while working in rotational shifts.  Though she was completely against night shifts but she understood me they are a part of my work and suggested me to maintain normal food timings as I have on my morning shift hours.  She also encouraged me to start working  out.  I have made all these changes and I am happy that I don't have to rely on medication for my problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Daksha is an amazing doctor. *** ** **** ************* *** provides to the point insight and feedback. I visited her for my irregular periods and found out that I had a serious case of cysts on my ovaries. She was very kind and sweet in answering all my doubts and she took all the effort to explain me in detail how I should carry on the treatment. *** ********* ****** *********** *** after a year I saw great improvements. She pushes you towards good health **** *** ******* ********* *** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I truly recommend the doctor. She listens to the problem very patiently, understands it and explains it in detail with suggestions. She is extremely kind and humble and takes great care to see the patient. She actually helps you get better in the longer run and prescribe whats best for you. She never rushes to get over you but give you ample time to be satisfied and clear all the questions in mind.  She does the tests very precisely and let you be knowledgable too about the condition. She makes you comfortable to express your issues and take back the most suitable recommendations.

We are ok with our consultation with the Doc. She took her time to explain things to our satisfaction and understanding. She was very vocal about recommending us to a different specialists based on the issue we were having. Only point of dissatisfaction I have is with the billing. We first consulted her on 13th Nov. She called us for follow up consultation with the test reports. We went on 18th Nov. Within 5 days we were charged another 300 rupees. I don't think a patient should be charged again or within 7 days considering the fact that doctor herself asked us to come for follow up.  Request the doctor to look into this for all her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr.Daksha during our pregnancy and she was very friendly and always guided us in every visit. The best part was she used to appreciate us what we were doing right and if any issue arose, she would provide us solution by suggesting dietary changes and exercise. I would highly recommend this doctor if you are pregnant for the first time, she always patiently listens to all questions and clarifies them one by one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a wonderful experience with Dr. Daksha Bakre at Cloudnine hospital. She has incredible experience and is very helpful and friendly. We especially loved how Dr. Daksha really took her time to explain everything in a clear manner. Her advice and suggestions put us at ease and we felt confident in receiving expert medical care. Following all her advice ensured us a smooth pregnancy and delivery. We are so glad to choose her and would highly recommend Dr. Daksha to everyone.

She is an awesome doctor. Very friendly, caring and always  responds over call . I visited her for pregnancy. She is not atall money minded. From the beginning she prepared me for normal delivery. Because of her  efforts and encouragement I could have the NVD. Also she inculcated a positive attitude towards motherhood in me. I strongly recommend this doctor.

Excellent Dr. ...I first visited her 3 months back and since then my experience with her has only been positive. *** *** **** ********* *** is a very patient listener. She gives the patient sufficient to.e explain all the issues and then explains all the scenarios clearly and in detail. She is also a very positive person and you already feel half good by just talking with her. **** ** **** she is not at all commercial which is very unlike other doctors in Bangalore

context: Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: We love Our Doctor Daksha Madam. She is very patient and compassionate about her each patients. She doesn't force for unnecessary tests and scans only recommends what is good for the to be Mother and the coming baby. We are very happy to have her as our Doctor.

Trustable, Dependable *** ************* ******* Have been her patient from a while and have watched her grow from a clinic at her home to a proper one today. On treatment front...it seems a little serious and will take time but I am sure that under her and with her care...it will all be well. We admire her caring nature, friendliness and the way she gives time to patients with patience. Thank you.

very sweet doctor but behold!!!very under experienced. she took my first scan and diagnosed that my pregnancy was an empty sac with no baby growing inside she even scheduled my DNC and gave me  zero percent hope.... but instead of going to her DNC i decided to take a second opinion. and today im sitting with my healthy 1.5 year old son who would got  aborted in the hands of such a naive doctor

I highly appreciate the doc.she is so caring. I have been visiting her since my cyst problem. After that I consulted her during my pregnancy. She took full care of me during this period. She gives full time to her patients. And now I'm the proud mother of healthy baby. She visited me in hospital after her delivery time too. I really  recommend  her if you are searching for a good gyno in the city.kudos to her.

* **** *********** ** ****** ********* *** ********* ******* ** listen to patients and make them feel comfortable. I consulted a few other doctors before finalizing with Dr Daksha. None of them inspired the confidence she does. I am at the end of my pregnancy and very happy with the support and treatment she has provided.

context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Excellent doctor I got during my most valuable moment. I have been consulting Dr. Daksha before pregnancy and at present I became a Mom. Her way of treatment is really excellent and very nicely explained every thing to us. Mine was high risk pregnancy due to high bp. But she has given nice consultation to me in all my critical movements. She treated as like we r part of her family. Thanks a lot Dr. Daksha for every thing. I highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her throughout my pregnancy..she is very friendly *** *************..i had very good experience with her she never made me make unnecessary hospital visits in my pregnancy..i would really recommend her to others.. thankyou Daksha mam for making my pregnancy journey healthy and beautiful!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** ***** she was a part of my pregnancy journey from the beginning and still is post my delivery. i cant think of a better doctor. *** ** ****** ************* *** ******** she is strict for all the right reasons. she will ensure you have a healthy pregnancy, baby and even healthy post pregnancy body. Highly recommended!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very good experience. Dr Daksha Ma'am is very friendly. She listens our problems patiently then suggests the solutions. First she suggests natural remedies. No unnecessary tests,medicines. When I meet her smile automatically comes out in my face. In my life first time i saw a doctor like her. From my experience she is awesome. Highly Recommended.

I'd given a bad review earlier because I was tensed about the results and wanted to see a doctor immediately but couldn't since there were no slots available for a couple of days. But in retrospect, that's not fair for the doctor, as she was pretty friendly when she saw us. I recommend the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very process oriented. I really liked to way she writes the problems what patient is facing. Explain the issue which is the reason of falling sick and understands how to go ahead. Prescribes NO unnecessary medicines. Very soft and open to talk and makes her patient understand what can be the illness issues, even if it is in a medical term, she explained it in a normal word which we can understand. i really liked her approach.  Will give her Thumbs-up.

She is very good. Have very good patience to listen and understand gives all the best possible option to help.  I will definitely recommend her. She is very concerned about her patient. She also ask to call any time if need help which is rare. Any one should not have any doubt in mind or second thought to visit her.

First visit : Good
Second visit : Good
Don't know what happened to the doc during our 3rd visit. She was extremely rude (without any reason.)
She pretends to be friendly but is actually not.
She herself shared her WhatsApp number for doubts and issues but then started blabbering random stuff like "If I think your question doesn't make sense then I won't answer it. I'm not here for chit-chats."
****** *** ********* ***** **** ***** * *** **** Yes, patients do not have medical expertise *** ****** *** ****** *** **** **** * ******* Even if their questions are naive, it's your duty to address them. 
My advise - Avoid this doctor. ***** *** **** ***** ************** *** *** *** **** *********** **** *** *** ** *** **** * ************* *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I I first visited Dr. Daksha for PCOD treatment. I had been to few doctors previously but no change. I a simply  gaining weight without knowing the exact reason. But she analyzed properly and found the root problem and she predicted that after 6 months you will come back with a positive pregnancy test and here i am pregnant after 6 months. I am really lucky to have found her. Her positivity is amazing, she always gives good hopes and she explains everything so that u understand it completely. * ***** ****** ******* ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ** *** ***** ******** my mother was facing problems due to some problem in uterus and irregular periods. Before meeting Dr.Daksha I consulted with many gynecologist but was not satisfied with the treatment, my mother was supposed to get biopsy done as prescribed by other doctors, without doing proper scans. After meeting Dr.daksha, she treated so well. my mother has to go under two scans before biopsy after that only we can treat further, after checking the report, Dr. informed we don't require any biopsy or further treatment. This news was very relaxing. my mother is good now without any biopsy done which she told is unnecessary and doesn't need any medicines or extra treatment, and gave few suggestions which she has to follow. very much happy with her treatment. I highly recommend Dr.Daksha.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for Pregnancy checkup. Doctor adked me to do one test for internal analysis, I thought it is a part of consultation, but collected 1200 for this test alone and prescribed around 15 tests including blood urine ultrasound etc. and we don‚Äôt know for what there tests required. they charged totally 5000+ only for tests. Explanation for the health condition was not so good. Not worth paying. Its unbearable to middle class people. For the hospital I could give 0 star. For the doctor it could be 3 star.

After careful consideration and reviews from Practo I chose to visit Dr Bakre for my regular gynae check up but to my surprise on the day of consultation before even meeting me or knowing my purpose to visit her, her staff asked me to sign a consent form which was not required for a general check up. Though, after my argument with staff, her assistant asked her again but she was so adamant to get it done before meeting her. She didn‚Äôt even had any courtesy to at ask for my concerns and let me go without meeting me.
It‚Äôs better if you let your patients know beforehand so they are aware about this consent form and decide if they are not comfortable with it.

Very genuine and really good. She really cares about the patients. She responded to all my queries and even when she was busy and i had doubts about my 
medicine dosage, she messaged me all the details and ensured i got them right. I would strongly recommend her to anyone. I have never felt more comfortable with any gynecologist before.

*** **** ****** * **** **** ********** I am consulting her for past 8-9 months and I am happy the way she diagnosed me. Always insisted on lifestyle changes instead of prescribing too many medicine and test. She is very ethical in her practice and would recommend her to everyone.

She is very nice doctor You can feel the positivity she creates by her words and analysis. She is very calm give sufficient time to see if all checklists are taken care. I recommend her compared to other high profile doctors like some in Apollo Hospital who dont bother to check and go in details about the patient.

Doctor is very good and systematic. She has suggested certain tests and clearly communicated the objective behind it. She explained the test results clearly to us and suggested us the next steps. We are proceeding with the laparoscopy based on her suggestion and hopeful about the results. We definitely recommend her  :)

Hey guys, 

Dr. Daksha is just awesome.. Lucky is the one who consult her.. She has so much of positivity!  She passes it to us too!  She talks better than a mother.. I know it sounds a little over appreciating but since I don't have my parents around I could really feel the care she shared. 

I would definetly recommend her for women expecting! 

Take care

Dr is very good and nice and sweet she is very good gnyacologist and obstetrician... Just loved her very good dr..... Recommend for all gynaec problems...and she was very friendly with me and she is very much polite and the problems she explained in detail and the treatment was very effective 
 Very good dr ...

I have been consulting Dr. Daksha from past 1.5 years and have also recommended to my friends and collogues. She is great doctor and a very comfortable person to speak. She makes the patient comfortable and educate them about their issues with a medical & practical approach. I have also been very satisfied with her treatment on various issues. Wish her all the best for future.

Daksha is the first doctor that I have met in my life, who cares a lot about her patients, who don't cares about money. I have consulted 4 doctors b4 I consult Daksha. Everyone suggested me go for lot tests and charged huge money and found nothing. In simple words about Daksha is A Doctor with human being. Thanks a lot Dr Daksha.

Amazing very friendly doctor and patient to understand the complete explaination, cool calm and organized review of the problem. Diagonise properly and explain the best probable reason for the issue. Prescribed medicines and good and speedy recovery and relief. General steps to follow too avoid future such issues.

She is very sweet. Explains the problem , probable things that can go wrong and makes it sure that everything is alright is with the patient before we leave her clinic. She was very patient with me. Her voice is just very soothing that you feel you're in safe hands.

We consulted to dr daksha for pre pregnancy consultation. She listened to our questions carefully and suggested best ideas. Instead of saying that after 1 month come again she gave us some treatment which we can try at our home. Really found this very useful.

I had a awesome experience with Dr Daksha B not only in her clinic but I delivered my baby girl in motherhood maternity hospital too.when I m in pain she supports me like a really very caring person the way she encouraging in pain I must say she is really kindly personality person.she is really best doctor.

*** ** *** **** ****** ****** ***** **** ****** ***** *********** she takes the concerns very seriously. i have got labor pains in 32 weeks which is too early and not good for the baby. she treated with me some steroids so that the pregnancy could be postponed. later i got delivered in my 37th week with a healthy baby.. Thanks a lot mam!!

This was the first time I visited Dr. Daksha, she treated me really well and considered all my issues. Not only with the issue I was facing, she also helped me for general health issues. Also, she told me about a new vaccination to be taken. I would recommend others to visit her for any gyna issues.

Dr is very excellent... Awesome..... She is nice person she always gives the right solutions to the patients problems... She explains very patiently and calmly....and doctor gives always good suggestions which always works positively and their is no negativity and   the most important is  that doctor feels the feeling of the patient she is amazing doctor...........words are not enough to describe the doctor awesome....‚ò∫ doctor.......
** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * ********* ** **** She made my complete pregnancy journey very smooth with her expert advice and proper guidance. I‚Äôm really thankful to her.
.Had a good experience even though the appointment was delayed. She patiently listened to our issues and explained everything in detail.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
